de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.similarityfunction

Interface PrimitiveSimilarityFunction<O>

  • Type Parameters:
    O - object type
    All Superinterfaces:
    SimilarityFunction<O>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    NormalizedPrimitiveSimilarityFunction<O>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDBIDSimilarityFunction, AbstractPrimitiveSimilarityFunction, AbstractVectorSimilarityFunction, ClusteringAdjustedRandIndexSimilarityFunction, ClusterIntersectionSimilarityFunction, ClusterJaccardSimilarityFunction, HellingerDistanceFunction, InvertedDistanceSimilarityFunction, JaccardSimilarityDistanceFunction, Kulczynski1SimilarityFunction, Kulczynski2SimilarityFunction, LaplaceKernelFunction, LinearKernelFunction, PolynomialKernelFunction, RadialBasisFunctionKernelFunction, RationalQuadraticKernelFunction, SigmoidKernelFunction

    public interface PrimitiveSimilarityFunction<O>
extends SimilarityFunction<O>
    Interface SimilarityFunction describes the requirements of any similarity function.
    Author:
    Elke Achtert
